author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 45-year-old second-hand vehicle dealer was sentenced to life term for raping two minor girls, by the Mahila Court on Wednesday.

Srinivasan (45), of Tirunagar Colony in Sathy limits had, last year, abused two 10-year-old girls in his neighbourhood. Based on a complaint preferred by the mother of one of the girls, the Sathy All Women Police registered a case and arrested Srinivasan. Mahila Court Judge Thirunavukarasu sentenced Srinivasan to prison term for the rest of his life.
title: Life term for raping two girls
